name: Retrieve list of Customer Credit Applications in Progress

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000932050024000"

When I call the view Customer Credit Applications in Progress API for CIF Key <cifKey>
| cifKey |
| 0100000932050024000 |

Then the following credit applications data should be returned
| applicationID | sanctionStatus | appSystem | productName | amount | appExpiryDate | appDate | productCode | staffID | description | staffName | productGroup | productGroupCode |
| 15187092 | SANCTIONED-BOOKED | NAPS | PERSONAL LOAN - 55001 | 5420.20 | 2014-12-14 | 2014-09-15 | 55001 | 73681 | Matrix Loans |  | Loan | LN |
| 15187092 | SANCTIONED-BOOKED | NAPS | PERSONAL BANK ACCOUNT PLUS - 40001 | 1000.00 | 2014-12-14 | 2014-09-15 | 40001 | 73681 | Current Account Personal |  | Current Account | CA |
